jx.jx_en_mean: be sensitive (or insensitive) to criticism or insults
jx.jx_cn_mean: 脸皮薄（或厚)，对批评（或侮辱）敏感（或不敏感）

entry.tran: (用于 dark、clear 等形容词之后构成形容词)表示“有…皮肤的”
entry.def: -skinned is used after adjectives such as 'dark' and 'clear' to form adjectives that indicate what kind of skin someone has.

example.ex: Dark-skinned people rarely develop skin cancer...
example.tran: 黑皮肤的人很少得皮肤癌。
